joy-composite.name: Temp - Check if Glossary has score

joy-join.joy-entity: Temp - Check if Glossary has score

joy-entities.joy-customquery: select max(DIM_TIME.TIM_CALENDAR_DATE) AS rundate, DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_NAME, avg(FRS_KPI_SCORE) AS SCORE, GLO_FK from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A, DIM_DQAXIS, DIM_TIME, DIM_TERM Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.DQX_FK = DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.TIM_FK = DIM_TIME.TIM_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK = DIM_TERM.TRM_PK GROUP BY dqx_name, tim_calendar_date, GLO_FK ORDER BY GLO_FK, tim_calendar_date

SELECT AVG (FRS_KPI_SCORE) AS SCORE, AVG (FRS_COST) AS COST, DQX_NAME, TRM_NAME, TRM_FK, DQX_FUNCKEY, B.GLO_FK FROM (select FACT_GOVERNANCE.*, DIM_TERM.CAT_FK, DIM_TERM.GLO_FK from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A, DIM_TERM Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK And DIM_TERM.TRM_PK = FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK) B, DIM_DQAXIS, DIM_TERM WHERE TRM_FK > 0 AND DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_PK = B.DQX_FK AND B.TRM_FK = DIM_TERM.TRM_PK GROUP BY DQX_NAME, TRM_NAME, TRM_FK, DQX_FUNCKEY, B.GLO_FK ORDER BY TRM_NAME

SELECT DISTINCT DIM_CATEGORY.CAT_PK, B.GLO_FK, DIM_CATEGORY.CAT_NAME, DIM_CATEGORY.CAT_FUNCKEY, DIM_CATEGORY.CAT_PARENT_FUNCKEY, DIM_CATEGORY.CAT_DATETIME_LOAD, DIM_CATEGORY.CAT_DESCRIPTION FROM (select FACT_GOVERNANCE.*, DIM_TERM.CAT_FK, DIM_TERM.GLO_FK from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A, DIM_TERM Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK And DIM_TERM.TRM_PK = FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK) B, DIM_CATEGORY WHERE B.CAT_FK = DIM_CATEGORY.CAT_PK AND B.CAT_FK > 0 order by B.GLO_FK
